prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with shimmering purple wings and a sleek body.
I want a psychic Pokemon that has a gentle personality and loves to fly high.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that can control the skies and has a beautiful silver sheen.
Make a flying-type Pokemon with a mysterious aura and graceful movements.
Imagine a mythical creature that can teleport and has vivid purple and white colors.
Design a Pokemon that embodies elegance and speed, with unique features like elongated fins.
Give me a rare flying Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has psychic abilities.
